website_summaries.verdict: The Sony PlayStation VR headset brings powerful, compelling virtual reality, with motion control support, to the PlayStation 4.
pros: Works with non-VR apps and games
Low cost of entry compared with PC-based headsets
cons: Requires PlayStation Camera, which is not included
Slightly less powerful than its main competitors
Some motion-tracking hiccups when playing in brightly lit rooms

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday present
customer_reviews.text: It was bought as a gift for my 19 year old grandson, I am not tech savvy on these things but from the noise , amount of use , praise and general comments from him,his brothers and the girlfriends , I would say it’s been a great hit and therefore by definition it was given 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Darling

customer_reviews.title: Version 2 headset
customer_reviews.text: Virtual reality has shown to be helpful for austistic type of symptoms and although the fist PSVR concerned me with the numerous cables with risks of trips and falls etc this version has simplified the cabling. I’m looking forward to trying out Ark Park on the PSVR which was featured on a YouTube video on a different vr platform.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Wicked
customer_reviews.text: I was very cautious that this wouldn’t be that good but omg it’s a whole different gaming world.. I’ve had it 2weeks and I’m addicted to it! Bought some extra games with it. Watching dvds on here too is like being in the cinema with a massive screen... it’s great for 3D DVD’s.. I’m so glad I got one!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Lo res but great fun
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted one of these since they first came out. Bless you Black Friday! I'll admit - had I paid full price I would have been disappointed. The resolution is 720dpi - like an early 90s TV. Pixels are very obvious. But for what I paid its great fun.
customer_reviews.author: jezzadarlo

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer :-)
customer_reviews.text: This is just brilliant :-) For the record the "Starter Packs" DO come with the camera, I believe there is a newer pack now which also includes two move controllers as well, for an even cheaper price. If you have a PS4 & any interest in VR, do yourself a favour & get PSVR.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing! You feel like your in the game and can look around, it’s a really cool way to play, and also comes with a free game code for PlayStation VR Worlds which has lots of really good demos.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Brillient bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my son's birthday and he can't stop playing it. The game that comes with it is just a demo really of what you can expect. It really is worth the money but make sure to get the motion controllers to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Get a glimpse of the future.
customer_reviews.text: Immersion amazing, graphics a let down, blurry in the distance, maybe using the ps4 pro will sort out the visuals. Definatley a glimpse into the future but not quite there yet but still going to keep the headset because of the long line up of games released and going to be released. Psvr is a great new way to play games!
customer_reviews.author: beanflickingchampion

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Provides a good vr experience if you do not have a good pc to run vr. It is great fun and many family members with varying ages have enjoyed using this vr set. Comes with a few fun games to give you hours of fun. Can be uncomfortable or blurry if put on incorrectly but great for short play intervals.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Gooi

customer_reviews.title: Good fun but not blown away.
customer_reviews.text: Good fun although can be a bit awkward with the cables trailing from it. Make sure to take breaks regularly as it can get a bit sweaty when wearing it for a prolonged session. A little gimmicky tbh.
customer_reviews.author: Ratty No13

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Not what i expected - the marine descent shark encounter is jaw-dropping!
customer_reviews.author: KIno

customer_reviews.title: fun and something different
customer_reviews.text: great product and easy to set up, it was fun to use and easy to set up with my ps4 pro, VR is actually fun it’s one of those things you have to try it to know for yourself the move controllers in my opinion should be included
customer_reviews.author: Sam Smith

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Brought as a Christmas present on Black Friday deal great value for money recommend buying it when on offer hubbie loves the vr it's brilliant graphics are amazing
customer_reviews.author: mrs julie gilbert

customer_reviews.title: A BRILLIANT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely BRILLIANT. It can be used completely separately from the TV....so someone can play on this while others watching TV. The colours, visual features etc are brilliant. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: mary williams-browne

customer_reviews.title: Family favourite
customer_reviews.text: The whole family have loved using this. Most of the games are 1 player, but there are some 2 player games out there which enhance the playability.
customer_reviews.author: snowy1980

customer_reviews.title: Limited time working
customer_reviews.text: Ps vr great to play as long as it work as mine stopped working after for months The prossesor unit is faulty and the message you only get is that the HDMI cable is not fitted even yhoung I have fitted it correctly for the past time I have had this product. Only solution is to with by a new prossesor or by a whole new psvr starter kit
customer_reviews.author: benjamin foster

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very good price. Got it in the Black Friday sale. As a surprise present for my husband for Xmas. He was very happy Christmas morning 😄😄😄
customer_reviews.author: SiannyP

customer_reviews.title: £300 is not cheap but it’s well worth it. ...
customer_reviews.text: £300 is not cheap but it’s well worth it. I held off for year until it had hdr pass through and a big selection of games. Now is the time to get into VR
customer_reviews.author: steven stockd

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all the family
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for all the family, and playing beat saber gets you fit, also very competitive trying to beat each other's scores, would recommend without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Gift for son. Brilliant fun even for me a non gamer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend The Sony VR
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product from Sony really compliments the PS4 console and very pleased with the quality of the VR headset, which takes you into another dimension in the world of gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony  Hornby

customer_reviews.title: Returned items!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a new item, received this shabby box! Clearly it’s a return. Sending back
customer_reviews.author: Arran

customer_reviews.title: well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We weren't sure if we should spend money on this but in the end decided to go for it. It was very easy to set up and all of the family love it. The free "Bot" games are ok but it was when we installed the free version of VR World that you get a real idea of what this tech can do.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for an avid gamer and needless to say he loves it. Excellent headset and great games.
customer_reviews.author: Lor

customer_reviews.title: Drunk experience
customer_reviews.text: When I set it up, it looks like I was trying to drive absolutely drunk down a 1 way street getting chased by umpa lumpas
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unreal graphics... cant play for too long though, i had to keep running to be sick.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap but worth the money if you like gaming
customer_reviews.text: Great fun and brilliant effects. Bought the bundle on offer so was good value.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: This is great to experience
customer_reviews.text: This is great to experience, I personally wish I had more time to try it out more, when I have head the chance I find it brilliantly immersive.
customer_reviews.author: jpcampbell

customer_reviews.title: Fab!
customer_reviews.text: A great price after comparing different websites. Had some great fun with the VR.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: New to gaming but have been amazed by this kit. It is so immersive that I lose track of time. One downside I find if I use it for to long I get a head ache

customer_reviews.title: Missing items from box
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working but the VR worlds disk is missing from the box. The box had already been opened. I’m very disappointed that the disk is missing but don’t want to send it back as the previous one I ordered before this one wasn’t working.

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I bought in ages!
customer_reviews.text: Thought that now the starter pack is £200 I'd finally give it a go. Even with my PS4 slim I've got to say vr is amazing!! It's really got to be tried to be believed, the immersion in the games is unbelievable.

customer_reviews.title: Utterly fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The best addon for ps4 ever. The games are outstanding - RE is the most terrifying game ever.

customer_reviews.title: Appeared to be returned goods..
customer_reviews.text: Goods arrived on time, but factory seal broken and it appeared re-packed .

customer_reviews.text: It's a very interesting gadget but still needs to be improved.VR users know the issue with sweating and picture quality, blurry a bit.Sometimes it's difficult not to focus on the small pixels.

customer_reviews.text: Its worth the money for the novelty, and once thats worn off you can just lie down and watch Netflix in cinematic mode. Move controllers and screens need imprpving in the next version

customer_reviews.title: looks nice amazing experience

customer_reviews.text: Psvr is a fantastic bit of kit it makes the ps4 experience won't it should be. Top marks 10 out 10

customer_reviews.title: This is a great VR starter pack
customer_reviews.text: Great VR starter pack for beginners. Could be better with a nicer game :)

customer_reviews.title: Affordable but might not come with game
customer_reviews.text: Everything I wanted but the ‘PSvr worlds’ game did not come with the package despite saying that it would. The game was even on the box but there was no voucher code or demo disk anywhere to be found. Would recommend if looking for a cheap vr headset

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: Headsets fine but the camera stopped working after 3 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Allan

customer_reviews.title: This is V2 version.
customer_reviews.text: Great new way to play games. A lot of fun. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: All my concerns regarding first gen limitations were unfounded. This is the most immersive gaming yet, it is a great piece of kit! And my only regret is not buying it earlier. VR worlds is a beautifull tech demo experience to ease you in. Went through the two free demo discs from the ps store and already have a lengthy wishlist. The first game I bought was Moss. I now own Firewall: Zero Hour, Farpoint and Skyrim as well. I also tried playing 2D games for a bit in cinema mode and it is perfectly viable.
customer_reviews.author: Iulius Vladimir Toth

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level VR system if you want to experience ...
customer_reviews.text: Good entry level VR system if you want to experience what VR is, I was very impressed but the resolution is not as good as oculus or hive but if haven't got a high performance PC or a shed load of money to buy one plus the VR set them this is the best option.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good immersive game experiences
customer_reviews.text: Already had an Oculus Rift but I fancied this as it would be conveniently located near the PS4 in the living room. Very impressed. I use it all the time for watching Sky/Netflix etc. Footie on a virtual, personal iMax screen is the way forward. Good immersive game experiences too
customer_reviews.author: nickb

customer_reviews.title: Techno lottery what's in the box?
customer_reviews.text: Yeah hooray at last after 3 attempts I now have a psvr unit that functions with my ps4 pro. No more black screens no more unplugging much more compact cable solution!! Sony you sure didn't show us pro owners much love now did you?
customer_reviews.author: marco

customer_reviews.title: immersive expensive experience
customer_reviews.text: Very immersive expensive experience as someone who wares glasses I was annoyed when I put this on as I needed it close to my eyes but it was touching my glasses. it I pulled it one notch away I could see too much of the outside world. ruining the experience either way. usually when I play this I wear Contact lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. J. Brockbank

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile.
customer_reviews.text: Very good kit, value for money. The space game and London heist were both amazing. The PSVR has a wide selection of titles in different genres, it is an experience that you can not get from looking at a TV screen. The moment you put the headset on then the world around you changes. It is like you are really there.
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Despite the graphic resolution stated as being lower than the Vive which I had previously owned, I was pleasantly surprised at how clear and focused the PSVR is. The setup was a lot easier and the head gear less weight and comfortable. The PSVR also has the greatest range of games available atm (this review 30/07/18) and at the price; unbeatable imho.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Coates

customer_reviews.title: it arrived timely and was a very good gift for my adult son
customer_reviews.text: Performs as well as advertised. One has to get used to some of the motion. Certain games have very quick movements that can make you dizzy but that's not uncommon with virtual reality programs. All in all, it arrived timely and was a very good gift for my adult son.
customer_reviews.author: babyalice

customer_reviews.title: Sick or VR?
customer_reviews.text: Really good experience but not for weak stomach. I got sick a few days after playing it and still not sure if I had caught a virus or if it was from the VR. Some games are fine, others (like rollercoaster simulation one and resident evil 7) had me sweating and feeling a bit sick. I will stick to the games I know are ok for me for now and persevere as the technology and actual experience is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Joe Dyer

customer_reviews.title: really love the VR experiences great fast delivery only thing i ...
customer_reviews.text: really love the VR experiences great fast delivery only thing i found was no cleaning cloth was included
customer_reviews.author: R. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: It's a GIFT!
customer_reviews.text: As with the PlayStation before this VR item is also a gift. I have had no complaints from the recipient.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Great, but careful if you want 4k pass through to tv.
customer_reviews.text: Careful on which version you need. 1st Gen doesn't allow 4k pass through. 2nd gen does.
customer_reviews.author: RobMog

customer_reviews.title: The new Version is worth the money. Sell your ...
customer_reviews.text: The new Version is worth the money. Sell your old one as fast you can before prices for used gets more down.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Beck

customer_reviews.title: Reboxed? Used not new?
customer_reviews.text: I think I may have been given a used PSVR bundle. The lenses were dirty and the box it came in was ripped. Also i saw online that people took a protective film off the lenses but that was missing from mine. VR itself is very fun but just a shame about the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: when the parcel was delivered it had been opened and the processor was missing,item returned,not impressed !!
customer_reviews.author: madjinx

product_meta.title: PlayStation VR Starter Pack
product_meta.description:
Fully compatible with PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 4 Pro, PlayStation VR is simple to set up and use.

Just connect the headset to your console, add a PlayStation Camera and then jump into new and exciting virtual reality worlds.

EXPERIENCES
Go beyond gaming and discover new experiences, movies and videos.

Swing into action with Spider-Man: Homecoming - Virtual Reality Experience; feel the terror of The Upside Down in Netflix's Stranger Things VR Experience; hear the call of the wild in Virry; scale the world's highest mountain in Everest; explore the dawn of life with David Attenborough's First Life VR; and enjoy a personal recital by a renowned violinist in Joshua Bell VR Experience.

PERIPHERALS AND COMPATIBLE GAMES AND KEY FEATURES
Enhance the experience with PS VR peripherals.

A range of PlayStation VR peripherals immerses players even deeper into the action, enhancing their play and giving them complete control in virtual reality games and experiences.

PLAYSTATION VR AIM CONTROLLER
Discover a new level of intense action with the intuitive controller built for PS VR shooters. Move through an expanding range of compatible games armed with an arsenal of DUALSHOCK 4 controls*- all built into an ergonomic left or right handed design. Take aim. Take control.

Open fire in compatible games including Farpoint, Bravo Team, DOOM VFR and Arizona Sunshine.

PLAYSTATION MOVE MOTION CONTROLLERS (TWIN PACK)
Reach further into the exciting world of PlayStation VR and discover new experiences in a huge range of PlayStation Move compatible games. Motion controllers can become anything from weapons to your own virtual hands - deeply immersing you in your surroundings with intuitive controls, vibration feedback and built-in rechargeable battery.

Explore compatible games including The Inpatient, SUPERHOT VR and Star Trek Bridge Crew.

DUALSHOCK 4 WIRELESS CONTROLLER
Most PlayStation VR games are compatible with the DUALSHOCK 4 wireless controller. The PlayStation camera constantly tracks your headset and compatible controllers to fully ground you in your virtual surroundings.



BOX CONTAINS


 * VR headset
 * PlayStation camera
 * PlayStation VR Worlds PlayStation Store voucher code
 * Processor unit
 * AC adapter
 * AC power cord
 * HDMI cable
 * USB cable
 * Stereo headphones
 * Earpieces
 * Printed materials
 * Cleaning cloth
feature_bullets: Discover virtual reality worlds with over 100 games and experiences with PlayStation VR; powered by cutting-edge technology, PlayStation VR transports players from their homes into the heart of immersive virtual reality games and experiences

Through high visuals, 3D audio and intuitive controls, PlayStation VR players live out their epic gaming dreams - from high-octane racing and battling dragons, to exploring deep space and coming face-to-face with nerve-shredding horror; jump into over 100 virtual reality games and experiences with PlayStation VR
With everything you need to get started in one box - PlayStation VR headset, PlayStation camera and PlayStation VR worlds; just connect to your PS4 or PS4 Pro to begin your VR experience
